title: Provided that, if the land under industrial zone is utilized entirely for non-polluting industries, IT / ITES or like purposes, then such buffer zone / open space shall not be necessary
clause_text: Provided that, if the land under industrial zone is utilized entirely for non-polluting industries, IT / ITES or like purposes, then such buffer zone / open space shall not be necessary.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
